other_tests.findings: Moderate improvement of auditory hallucinations with a 35% reduction in Auditory Hallucination Rating Scale score after the first course. General SAPS score improved, with a 30% reduction in severity.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After a second course, auditory hallucinations improved by 80%, and SAPS score decreased from 38 to 16, with stabilization of SAPS scores at 10 over the next 6 months.

other_tests.findings: Initial score of 34 before the first transcranial magnetic stimulation course.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Score reduced by 35% after the first course; further improvement observed after the second course followed by maintenance therapy, with scores remaining at 0 more than 1 year later.

other_tests.findings: Chest tightness, nausea, anxiety, and palpitations observed without electrocardiogram changes or cardiac-enzyme elevation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Symptoms resolved within 2 hours; no further incidents reported with lower doses of modafinil.
